Player History
Injured on 4/29/1977 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/22/1981 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 6/11/1984 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/7/1984, off John Malone (LP)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/11/1984, off Luis Rios (LYN)...
Injured on 4/14/1987 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/10/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $450,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 3/1/1991 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Pontiac to New Jersey on 3/1/1991 (Going to NJ: SS R. Burroughs. Going to PON: P J. Stokes, P D. Christianson)...
